translations: adj.乐于助人的；肯通融的；随和的，温顺的
v.容纳；为……提供住宿；使适应；调节（accommodate 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: Eddie was among the most approachable athletes on the team, always very accommodating to me.
sentences.translation: 艾迪是队里最容易接近的运动员之一，总是很乐于帮助我。

sentences.sentence: A child's facility in accommodating itself to circumstances was never more strikingly illustrated.
sentences.translation: 孩子适应环境的能力没有比现在这样更出色的了。
供应商也不那么随和了。
